title: Sprox: data driven web development (#137)
description:
Sprox: data driven web development

Presented by Jorge L Vargas

Sprox is a web frontend tool built to handle the creation and
manipulation of data.

Sprox is smart about your data. You should never write repetitive code
again. Sane defaults and easy overwrites is what makes Sprox guess what
you need for your fields.

This talk will give an overview of Sprox, what it does and how to use
it. Then we'll explore the available backends (SQLAlchemy, MongoDB) and
dive into the tgext.admin package, which is the "Admin Tool" for the
TurboGears2 framework.
